title: How to Make a Pie Floater

steps.headline: Make a bowl of green pea soup.
Make or purchase a meat pie.
Drop the pie into the bowl of green pea soup.
steps.description: Try to centre it. An alternative is to place the pie in the bowl upside down and pour the soup over it.

steps.headline: Squirt tomato sauce all over the pie.
Eat it hot.
steps.description: It's best to eat before the pie becomes too soggy.

text: Make a bowl of green pea soup.  Make or purchase a meat pie.  Drop the pie into the bowl of green pea soup. Try to centre it. An alternative is to place the pie in the bowl upside down and pour the soup over it. Squirt tomato sauce all over the pie.  Eat it hot. It's best to eat before the pie becomes too soggy.
